Item ID1617

An uncut diamond is a rare precious stone. Players with 43 Crafting can craft one into a diamond by using it with a chisel. Cutting one grants 107.5 Crafting experience.

There is a fee of one cut diamond to enter the Zanaris marketplace, where the dragon dagger and longsword can be purchased.

Contents

  • 1 Obtaining
  • 2 Products
  • 3 Training
    • 3.1 Crafting
    • 3.2 Magic
    • 3.3 Other
  • 4 Item sources
    • 4.1 Shop locations
  • 5 Changes
    • 5.1 Gallery (historical)

Obtaining[edit | edit source]

Free players can obtain them a few ways:

  • Mining
  • Completing the random events: Evil Bob, Evil Twin, Rick Turpentine, or Mysterious Old Man
  • Killing monsters that have access to the rare drop table

Members can obtain them through several other methods:

  • Reward from the Gnome Restaurant minigame
  • Opening bags full of gems from Motherlode Mine (40 nuggets)
  • Mining gem rocks in the Shilo Village Gem Mine or during the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame
  • Catching a casket with a big net fishing
  • Opening with a brimstone chest with a brimstone key
  • Killing Slagilith in One Small Favour (1)
  • Quest reward from Troll Romance (1)
  • Getting it as reward of the Spoils of war of Soul Wars Minigame

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Diamonds can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a gold bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[1] Output Sell Price Profit / loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
43 Uncut diamond 2,743 Diamond 1,853 −890 107.5 311,750 −8.28
43 Diamond Gold bar 1,940 Diamond ring 1,923 −17 85 55,250 −0.2
56 Diamond Gold bar 1,940 Diamond necklace 2,028 88 90 58,500 0.98
58 Diamond Gold bar 1,940 Diamond bracelet 2,037 97 95 61,750 1.02
70 Diamond Gold bar 1,940 Diamond amulet (u) 1,956 16 100 65,000 0.16
1 Diamond amulet (u) Ball of wool 1,992 Diamond amulet 2,046 54 4 8,000 13.5
  1. ↑ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand exchange.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Diamond jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-4 Enchant, requiring level 57 Magic. The spell requires 1 Cosmic rune, 10 Earth runes, and the piece of Diamond Jewellery that is to be enchanted.

Unenchanted Cost of Unenchanted Jewellery Material Cost[1] Enchanted Sell price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Diamond ring 1,923 2,017 Ring of life 1,831 −186 67 107,200 −2.78
Diamond necklace 2,028 2,122 Phoenix necklace 2,198 76 67 107,200 1.13
Diamond bracelet 2,037 2,131 Abyssal bracelet 2,211 80 67 107,200 1.19
Diamond amulet 2,046 2,140 Amulet of power 2,060 −80 67 107,200 −1.19
  1. ↑ Cost calculated using a Staff of earth (provides unlimited Earth runes) and includes costs of Cosmic runes.

Other[edit | edit source]

Cut Diamonds can also be used to make the following items:

  • Diamond bolt tips, which require level 65 Fletching and yield 6 experience per gem

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 July 2007
(update)

The item was graphically updated.

Date unknown

Gems available on free-to-play worlds can no longer be crushed with a hammer to receive a members object (crushed gem).
